description: Try our easy to follow Roast Char-Siu Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Char-Siu Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: While pork is resting, heat a wok over high heat. When hot, add vegetable oil and swirl to coat. Add walnut and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate. Reheat wok. Add bok choy and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add 2 tbs water and cover. Cook for 2 minutes or until wilted. Return walnut to wok and toss to combine. Serve with pork.

Add bok choy and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add 2 tbs water and cover. Cook for 2 minutes or until wilted. Return walnut to wok and toss to combine. Serve with pork.
